predictions.text: From 2025-10-09 close to 2025-11-30 close, Invesco QQQ (QQQ) will underperform SPDR Dow Jones Industrial Average ETF (DIA) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percentage change from 2025-10-09 adjusted close to 2025-11-30 adjusted close for QQQ and DIA (Yahoo Finance). Outcome is true if (QQQ_pct - DIA_pct) <= -3.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Market breadth and factor rotation toward value/industrials
Negative AI sentiment shifts or regulatory headlines
predictions.rationale: AI-heavy QQQ is rate-sensitive; BoE bubble risk and firm real yields favor value and cyclicals in DIA.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury Inflation-Indexed Security yield (FRED: DFII10) will close at or above 2.10% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm DFII10 daily close on FRED reaches or exceeds 2.10% on any date up to and including 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Fed communication on term premium and balance sheet
predictions.rationale: Sticky inflation risk and heavy supply keep term premia elevated, pushing real yields to test cycle highs.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. initial jobless claims will print at or above 235,000 in at least one weekly Department of Labor Unemployment Insurance report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check any weekly DOL Unemployment Insurance news release up to 2025-11-15; if initial claims (SA) >= 235,000, this resolves true.
monitoring_signals: Company layoff announcements and WARN notices
predictions.rationale: Labor market cooling and shutdown-related disruptions raise the odds of a transient claims uptick.

predictions.text: Henry Hub Natural Gas front-month futures (NYMEX: NG) will settle at or below $2.60 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify front-month NG settlement price on CME/NYMEX at or below $2.60 on any session through 2025-11-15.
monitoring_signals: NOAA temperature outlooks and HDD forecasts
predictions.rationale: High storage and shoulder-season demand risk a brief overshoot lower, especially with mild weather.

predictions.text: The U.S. Dollar Index (ICE: DXY) will close at or above 108.00 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the DXY closing level (ICE or Yahoo Finance: DX-Y.NYB) reaches or exceeds 108.00 on any UTC day by deadline.
monitoring_signals: US macro surprises vs G10 peers
BoJ policy signals and MoF FX commentary
predictions.rationale: Firm U.S. data and elevated real yields support the dollar; risk-off can amplify upside.

predictions.text: Microsoft (MSFT) will report Azure (including Azure AI) constant-currency revenue growth between 23% and 28% YoY for Q1 FY2026 in its earnings release by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Read MSFT’s Q1 FY2026 earnings materials (press release/presentation/transcript). Use the stated Azure cc growth range; resolves true if within 23–28%.
monitoring_signals: MSFT and partner commentary on Azure AI adoption
Enterprise demand indicators and IT spend surveys
predictions.rationale: AI services and enterprise cloud demand sustain mid-20s growth, tempered by optimization and FX.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Taiwan’s MOD will report at least one 24-hour period with 60 or more PRC military aircraft detected around Taiwan.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check daily airspace activity updates on Taiwan MOD’s official site or social channels; if any daily report shows ≥60 aircraft within the window, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: PLA large-scale exercises or carrier group movements
USN transits/FONOPs in the Taiwan Strait
Cross-strait political tensions or election timelines
predictions.rationale: Periodic surge incursions have occurred; rising regional tensions make another large sortie likely.

predictions.text: The 2025 Nobel Peace Prize laureate(s) announced on 2025-10-10 will include at least one whose primary work concerns climate change mitigation, adaptation, or environmental protection.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify Nobel Peace Prize announcement on NobelPrize.org; assess primary work focus of laureate(s) from official biography/press release.
monitoring_signals: Recent global focus on climate-related conflicts
predictions.rationale: Escalating climate impacts and security linkages increase probability of climate-focused recognition.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or above 4.80% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm on FRED that DGS2 daily close reaches or exceeds 4.80% on any trading day through 2025-11-30 (UTC).
monitoring_signals: Front-end OIS path and Fed pricing
predictions.rationale: Delayed rate-cut expectations and firmer data can push the front end toward 4.8% or higher.

predictions.text: U.S. motor gasoline product supplied (EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report) will print at or below 8.4 million barrels per day in at least one weekly report published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the EIA WPSR table for weekly motor gasoline product supplied; if any week through 2025-10-31 shows ≤ 8.4 mb/d, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: Mobility indicators (e.g., TSA throughput, Apple mobility)
predictions.rationale: Seasonal shoulder and price sensitivity typically lower gasoline demand into late October.

predictions.text: Euro area core HICP (YoY, flash) for October 2025 will print between 2.4% and 2.8% in Eurostat’s release due by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Eurostat flash HICP release; take core HICP YoY figure. Resolve true if within [2.4%, 2.8%].
monitoring_signals: Energy base effects and tax changes
predictions.rationale: Disinflation continues but services stickiness keeps core near mid-2s.

predictions.text: AST SpaceMobile (ASTS) will close at or above $12.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check ASTS daily close on a major exchange (NYSE/Nasdaq) through 2025-11-15 (UTC). Resolve true if any close ≥ $12.00.
monitoring_signals: Commercial service pilots and additional carrier deals
Broader risk sentiment and small-cap liquidity
predictions.rationale: The Verizon deal signals commercialization progress; further milestones could catalyze upside.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, at least two U.S.-listed companies will publicly announce intent to pursue a primary or dual listing on the Texas Stock Exchange (TXSE) via press release or SEC filing.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count company press releases or SEC filings explicitly stating plans for a TXSE primary or dual listing through 2025-11-30; at least two distinct issuers required.
monitoring_signals: TXSE corporate announcements and listing pipeline
Issuer complaints about NYSE/Nasdaq fees or rules
Underwriter and market-maker commitments to TXSE
predictions.rationale: Fresh SEC approval and issuer optionality increase the odds of near-term listing intent announcements.
